title.narrative: Supporting the consolidation of the anti-corruption and justice systems in Mexico by strengthening capabilities for detection and investigation of crime and corruption.

description.narrative: The Anti-Corruption & Rule of Law strand of the Mexico programme will contribute to the consolidation of the anti-corruption and justice systems in Mexico by strengthening capabilities for detection and investigation of crime and corruption cases. It will work to improve policy, procedures and standards; build capacity of public officials detecting and investigating crime and corruption cases; and improve inter-institutional coordination between security, justice and anti-corruption institutions. Creating an environment that promotes prosperity for all. This will increase economic growth by attracting investment and contributing to poverty reduction and gender equality. [Following a methodology change, from financial year 19/20 costs under this activity will be reported against a new activity line. You can find the new IATI identifier by looking up “other identifier information”.]
